simulated_ratings.title: Urban Cowboy (1980)

simulated_ratings.title: Body Heat (1981)
simulated_ratings.feeling: Sultry neo-noir with sharp tension and satisfying twists.

simulated_ratings.title: Return of Martin Guerre, The (Retour de Martin Guerre, Le) (1982)

simulated_ratings.title: Time Bandits (1981)

simulated_ratings.title: Paint Your Wagon (1969)

simulated_ratings.feeling: Visually striking and tender at heart, though the manic energy wore me down.

simulated_ratings.title: John Mulaney: The Comeback Kid (2015)

simulated_ratings.title: The Matrix Resurrections (2021)

simulated_ratings.title: Booksmart (2019)
simulated_ratings.feeling: Lively and affectionate, with sharp banter that mostly clicks despite some manic notes.

simulated_ratings.title: Brotherhood of the Wolf (Pacte des loups, Le) (2001)

simulated_ratings.title: Vamp (1986)

simulated_ratings.title: Simon Birch (1998)
simulated_ratings.feeling: Sincere and sweet, but the sentimentality feels a bit overdetermined for me.

simulated_ratings.title: Hurlyburly (1998)

simulated_ratings.title: Christopher Robin (2018)

simulated_ratings.title: After the Ball (1897)

simulated_ratings.title: Rawhead Rex (1986)

simulated_ratings.title: Cronos (1993)

simulated_ratings.title: Tutto quello che vuoi (2017)
simulated_ratings.feeling: Warm, gently funny intergenerational friendship that hit my soft spot for humane stories.

simulated_ratings.title: Borderland (2007)
